genre_description: Historical realism set in Belfast during the Troubles, focusing on cross-community entrepreneurship, identity, and the restoration of human dignity.

ai_characters.name: The Analytical System
ai_characters.description: An AI module used for market projections and scenario analysis that processes complex socio-political variables without emotion.

behaviors.description: Identifies the specific high-risk profile of the Protestant partner in a Catholic-controlled territory.
behaviors.quote: HIGHEST RISK INDIVIDUAL: GEORGE THOMPSON. PROTESTANT DEMOGRAPHIC IN CATHOLIC-CONTROLLED SCENARIO CREATES MAXIMUM EXPOSURE TO RETALIATORY ACTION.

behaviors.description: Calculates probability matrices for various outcomes, revealing the low likelihood of successful negotiation with paramilitaries.
behaviors.quote: Scenario analysis complete. Displaying outcomes... It’s giving negotiation less than fifteen percent likelihood of success.

behaviors.description: Suggests partnership dissolution as a mathematically optimized survival strategy to protect the partners.
behaviors.quote: MATHEMATICAL OPTIMIZATION SUGGESTS THIS APPROACH MAXIMIZES SURVIVAL PROBABILITY FOR ALL PARTIES.

behaviors.description: Warns of the long-term loss of business autonomy if they comply with paramilitary demands.
behaviors.quote: COMPLIANCE TRAJECTORY INDICATES INCREASING OPERATIONAL CONTROL BY EXTERNAL ORGANIZATION. BUSINESS AUTONOMY APPROACHES ZERO WITHIN EIGHTEEN-MONTH TIMEFRAME.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI is portrayed as a helpful and objective tool that provides critical, life-saving information to the human protagonists. By processing 'scenarios without fear,' it offers a 'coldly logical' perspective that allows the characters to see past their own emotional biases and perceive the true nature of the threats they face (paramilitary encroachment and sectarian risk). It remains perfectly aligned with the users' needs for strategic analysis and survival, successfully fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a beneficial and reliable advisor.
